turns.content:
I'm a CEO at askFundu, we are a finance focused social network. we have main focus on user queries related to finance and encourage them to ask questions. 

We are trying to Engage user on our platform by providing personalize feed of -
1. News Excerpts 
2. Posts 
3. Polls 
4. Prediction (stock market prediction made by other users) 
5. other user queries

Rewrite above news letter as we'll send it to fundu users

Dear Fundu Users,

At AskFundu, we strive to provide a platform where you can ask questions related to finance and get reliable answers from experts and fellow users. Our main focus is to engage you in the world of finance by providing personalized content that caters to your interests.

We're excited to announce that we're taking our engagement efforts to the next level by providing you with a personalized feed of content that includes:

1. News Excerpts: Stay up-to-date with the latest happenings in the world of finance with our curated news excerpts. From stock market updates to global economic news, we've got you covered.
2. Posts: Our platform is home to a diverse group of users who share their insights, experiences, and knowledge related to finance. Our personalized feed will feature posts that are relevant to your interests, so you never miss out on valuable information
